name: magik
description: Audio recording and transcription tool with Obsidian integration

scripts.dev:backend: concurrently -n backend-decision,backend-audio,backend-specification,backend-tabledocument -c blue,cyan,magenta,yellow "bun run dev:backend:decision" "bun run dev:backend:audio" "bun run dev:backend:specification" "bun run dev:backend:tabledocument"
scripts.dev:ui: concurrently -n ui-decision,ui-audio,ui-specification,ui-tabledocument -c green,cyan,purple,yellow "bun run dev:ui:decision" "bun run dev:ui:audio" "bun run dev:ui:specification" "bun run dev:ui:tabledocument"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,socket,ui -c blue,yellow,green "bun run dev:backend" "bun run dev:socket" "bun run dev:ui"
scripts.lint: bun run lint:backend & bun run lint:openapi
scripts.lint:cli: bun run lint:backend:ci & bun run lint:openapi
scripts.format:ws: for dir in apps/* packages/*; do [ -f "$dir/package.json" ] && (cd "$dir" && bun run format 2>/dev/null || true); done
scripts.format:ws:check: for dir in apps/* packages/*; do [ -f "$dir/package.json" ] && (cd "$dir" && bun run format:check 2>/dev/null || true); done
scripts.test:e2e:backend-socket:deployed: cd tests/e2e/backend-socket-e2e && TEST_BASE_URL="$TEST_BASE_URL" bun run test:deployed
scripts.test:e2e:backend-audio:deployed: cd tests/e2e/backend-audio-e2e && TEST_BASE_URL="$TEST_BASE_URL" bun run test:deployed
scripts.test:e2e:backend-decision:deployed: cd tests/e2e/backend-decision-e2e && TEST_BASE_URL="$TEST_BASE_URL" bun run test:deployed
scripts.test:e2e:backend-specification:deployed: cd tests/e2e/backend-specification-e2e && TEST_BASE_URL="$TEST_BASE_URL" bun run test:deployed
scripts.test:e2e: bun run test:e2e:backend-socket && bun run test:e2e:backend-audio && bun run test:e2e:backend-decision && bun run test:e2e:backend-specification
scripts.generate:clients: bun run --filter='@magik/backend-audio-client' generate && bun run --filter='@magik/backend-socket-client' generate
